ModMetaData.name: More Mod Extension Patch Operations
ModMetaData.author: Skye
ModMetaData.description: This is a small mod extension patch operation framework mod. It simply adds 3 new patch ops for mod extensions: mMEPO.PatchOperationRemoveModExtension, mMEPO.PatchOperationReplaceModExtension, and inspired by XML Extensions' PatchOperationAddOrReplace, there's a mMEPO.PatchOperationAddOrReplaceModExtension. This mod should make patch operations to overwrite, replace, or remove mod extensions much easier.
